statements: SELECT * FROM recidivism_data;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, reentry_program FROM recidivism_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT reentry_program FROM recidivism_data;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, participant_name, age, release_date FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_status = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, reentry_program FROM recidivism_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT id, participant_name, reentry_program FROM recidivism_data WHERE reentry_program IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data WHERE age < 25 AND reentry_program LIKE '%job%';
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_score > 0.8 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, recidivism_score FROM recidivism_data WHERE inmate_id = 12345;
SELECT AVG(recidivism_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM recidivism_data;
SELECT program_name, success_rate FROM reentry_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data JOIN reentry_programs ON recidivism_data.inmate_id = reentry_programs.program_id;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM reentry_programs WHERE success_rate < 0.7;
SELECT id, release_date FROM recidivism_data ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM reentry_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT inmate_id, COUNT(*) as recidivism_count FROM recidivism_data GROUP BY inmate_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM IncarcerationStats;
SELECT inmate_id, recidivism_status, incarceration_date, release_date FROM IncarcerationStats;
SELECT * FROM ReentryPrograms WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT program_name, success_rate, start_date, end_date FROM ReentryPrograms ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, activity_date, activity_type FROM InmateActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Exercise' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IncarcerationStats ORDER BY incarceration_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, recidivism_status FROM IncarcerationStats WHERE recidivism_status = 'Recidivated';
SELECT * FROM ReentryPrograms WHERE success_rate > 0.8 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT inmate_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM InmateActivities GROUP BY inmate_id HAVING activity_count > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM InmateActivities GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM inmates;
SELECT inmate_name, sentence_start_date, sentence_end_date FROM inmates WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM reentry_programs ORDER BY program_duration DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM reentry_programs WHERE program_type = 'Education' AND program_duration > 6;
SELECT report_id, recidivism_rate, report_date FROM recidivism_reports WHERE recidivism_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inmates ORDER BY inmate_name ASC, sentence_start_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_name, crime_type FROM inmates WHERE crime_type='Violent' ORDER BY inmate_name ASC;

SELECT inmates.inmate_name, reentry_programs.program_name FROM inmate_history INNER JOIN inmates ON inmate_history.inmate_id = inmates.inmate_id INNER JOIN reentry_programs ON inmate_history.program_id = reentry_programs.program_id ORDER BY inmates.inmate_name ASC;

SELECT inmates.inmate_name, recidivism_reports.recidivism_rate, recidivism_reports.report_date FROM inmates INNER JOIN recidivism_reports ON inmates.inmate_id = recidivism_reports.inmate_id WHERE recidivism_reports.recidivism_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY recidivism_reports.report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inmates, AVG(program_duration) AS avg_duration FROM inmate_history INNER JOIN reentry_programs ON inmate_history.program_id = reentry_programs.program_id;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data;
SELECT inmate_id, crime_type, recidivism_rate FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_rate > 0.5;
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_duration FROM reentry_programs WHERE success_rate > 0.7;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM inmate_details WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT program_id, participant_id, rating, feedback_text FROM program_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recidivism_data WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY recidivism_rate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, last_name, gender, education_level FROM inmate_details WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_duration, success_rate FROM reentry_programs WHERE program_type = 'Employment' ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT inmate_id, incarceration_date, release_date FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY release_date ASC
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_duration, success_rate FROM reentry_programs WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY program_name ASC
